text: Tonči Bašić (born 13 March 1974) is a Croatian football manager and a former player. He currently works as a director of sports for RNK Split. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Sportspeople from Split, Croatia Category:Living people Category:Croatian footballers Category:RNK Split players Category:NK Mosor players Category:NK Varaždin players Category:NK Marsonia players Category:HNK Šibenik players Category:1. title: Tonči Bašić
